patient_info: Trismus,Hyperhidrosis,Syncope,Vomiting,Loss of consciousness,Right bundle branch block,ST segment elevation
golden_diagnosis: Brugada syndrome 2,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 6,Brugada syndrome 5,Brugada syndrome 4,Brugada syndrome 8,Brugada syndrome 9,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 7,Brugada syndrome 3,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1
predict_diagnosis:
1. Brugada syndrome
2. Long QT syndrome
3. Catecholaminergic polymorphic ventricular tachycardia (CPVT)
4. Mitochondrial myopathy with arrhythmia susceptibility (MMAS)
5. Channelopathy-associated autosomal dominant progressive cerebellar ataxia (ADCA)
6. Prinzmetal angina (variant angina)
7. Sudden arrhythmic death syndrome (SADS)
8. Myocarditis
9. Inherited arrhythmias with conduction system disease (e.g., SCN5A-related sodium channelopathy)
10. Autonomic nervous system disorder (e.g., dysautonomia) leading to arrhythmias and syncope
